entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having eyes that discerned the building amidst the trees.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: A person who moved forwards quietly, mentioned alongside Harry.

entities.name: the old trees
entities.description: Trees that cast deep shadows and block light from the valley below.

entities.name: the building
entities.description: A house with mossy walls and a roof in disrepair, located amidst the trees.

relationships.description: Ogden moved forwards quietly, it seemed to Harry.
Harry's eyes discerned the building amidst the trees.
